scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp X-DolbyVoice-Client-LogId: LMI X-DolbyVoice-Client-RtpAsnDataOnly: 1 Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=edgeserver_1156615 3783490868 3783490868 IN IP4 10.204.66.46 s=MSC_1156615 i=connectionId:1156615 c=IN IP4 10.204.66.46 t=3773479837 0 m=audio 47480 RTP/AVP 99 101 a=rtpmap:99 PCMU/8000/1 a=ptime:30 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15 a=sendrecv

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

INFO sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Accept: application/sdp, text/*, application/msml+xml, application/moml+xml Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, REGISTER, INFO Supported: 100rel Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]
<msml version="1.1"> <createconference name="conf_0" deletewhen="nomedia"> <audiomix> <asn ri=" 90s" /> <n-loudest n="4" /> </audiomix> </createconference> </msml>

INFO sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Accept: application/sdp, text/*, application/msml+xml, application/moml+xml Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, REGISTER, INFO Supported: 100rel Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]
<msml version="1.1"> <join id1="conn:[$client_sip_id]" id2="conf:conf_0"> <stream dir="to-id1" media="audio"> <clamp dtmf="false" /> <gain amt="0" /> </stream> <stream dir="from-id1" media="audio"> <clamp dtmf="true" /> <gain amt="0" /> </stream> </join> </msml>

BYE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
